topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f7f1c563687261762b0400#post_54f7f1c563687261762b0400
As much as I like genderswap and as much as I like monster girls most of the time whenever someone does this is absolute shit.  Just look at the new female Thor; all she really is a crybaby who constantly gets upset and fucking constantly "misogyny" is crammed into the story.  I would totally want to see a major AAA series with that stuff, but most of the time mainstream media even touches anything to do with it they make it absolute shit.

If there was a AAA mainstream series about genderswap and/or monster girls your best bet would be to take something that was originally a porno and make it pg-13. . . excuse me a second while I feel sick at this.  Joking aside if there was a AAA mainstream series about say monster girls your best bet would be take say monster girl quest and remove the naughty bits, but keep the undertones, for that pg-13 rating.  What I mean by this is that remove the sex scenes, just keep the monster girls trying to seduce people, remove the more controversial fetishes and such.

topics.body:
Thinking further on it Monster Girl Quest could totally be made into a popular mainstream franchise.  I mean it'll obviously never happen, but it theoretically could.

Why?
1)the sex scenes and controversial fetishes could easily be removed
2)a lot of the players halfway stopped losing to get the h-scenes and played through for the story
3)most of the characters have costumes that can be realistically done
4)if you cut out the side quests that don't feed into the main story and everything the amount of time for the story gets reasonably close to movie length, obviously the side quests would be cut out, but most of the main story would remain intact
5)no writing needed; just make the dialogue pg-13 and cut out the sex scenes.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
